titles.title: Immortal, Invisible, God Only Wise (Walter Chalmers Smith)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Immortal, Invisible, God only wise, In light inaccessible hid from our eyes, Most blessed, most glorious, the Ancient of days, Almighty, victorious, Thy great name we praise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Immortal, invisible, God only wise, In light inaccessible hid from our eyes, Most blessed, most glorious, the Ancient of Days, Almighty, victorious, Thy great name we praise.{/lang-eng}
